item.title: About
item.description:
Hi! I’m Pavlo, an Android developer writing about Kotlin, architecture, functional programming and real-world stories from projects.

This blog is called Kotlin Tales because each post is a small story: about a bug, a design decision, or a pattern that made the code better.

item.title: Subscribe
item.description:
For now you can subscribe via:

  • RSS: /kotlintales/index.xml
  • Or follow me on LinkedIn / Telegram (links will be here later).

In the future I might add an email newsletter for new Kotlin Tales posts.
